name: TrayRSS
tagline: The goal of this tool is to offer the user a fast way to watch news given by an RSS or ATOM feed by tray notifications. To read the news, it will open a browser.  For more information see http://trayrss.nullpointer.at
body:
## about

All TrayRSS related sites are hostet on [sourceforge](http://sourceforge.net/projects/trayrss/) and [github](https://github.com/tpummer/trayrss-desk)

Recent News and announcements can be found on [nullpointer.at](http://www.nullpointer.at/kategory/trayrss-posts/)

## goal

The goal of this tool is to offer the user a fast and cheap way to read news given by an RSS or ATOM feed by tray notifications. To read the news, it will open a browser.
features

* read RSS Feeds
* Tool Tip Notification
* simple
* platform independet

## download

Download the latest stable version 1.4.0 from sourceforge: [latest stable](http://sourceforge.net/projects/trayrss/files/trayrss/1.4.0%20Final/TrayRSS-1.4.0-r273-distribution.zip/download) - at Sourceforge

Or pick a previous release: [All Releases](http://sourceforge.net/projects/trayrss/files/trayrss/) - at Sourceforge

## support

If you are looking for support you should use our mailing list: [trayrss-support](https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/trayrss-support) ([subscribe](https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/trayrss-support), [archive](https://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?forum_name=trayrss-support), [search](https://sourceforge.net/search/?type_of_search=mlists&group_id=257577))

Get more information on the project wiki within the old bug tracking system TrayRSS - [Wiki](https://github.com/tpummer/trayrss-desk/wiki)

Report a Feature Request or a Bug in our bug tracking system. Or visit it to get an overview about the current developement TrayRSS - [bugtracker](http://bug.nullpointer.at)

## license

TrayRSS is developed under the GPL 3.0 license, you can find the whole license here: [http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html).

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see .
